<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clandestine Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3067)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you pull up the hood of this nondescript gray cloak (an Interact action), you become drab and uninteresting, gaining a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks and to Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character, such as a servant, but also taking a –1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks. 

**Activate—Cloak Identity** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pull the cloak's hood up and gain the benefits of [_veil of privacy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739) for 1 hour or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Clandestine Cloak
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 230 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Clandestine Cloak (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2, and when you activate the cloak, you gain the benefits of 5th-rank [_veil of privacy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739) for 8 hours.
